koohiiStory1: See suck (#689): if it´s too big to handle, just use your fingers instead...
koohiiStory2: One of the first thing a baby can do with his hand is to reach out and grab your finger as if it was a little handle.
kunYomi: あつか.い、あつか.う、あつか.る、こ.く
myStory: xử lý. quản lý. điều trị. tay dùng giúp đỡ được
words:
扱い(あつかい): treatment, service
取り扱い(とりあつかい): treatment, service, handling, management
取り扱う(とりあつかう): to treat, to handle, to deal in
扱う(あつかう): to handle, deal with
